message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000.  I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get a better deal than $12,500.
